item.title: GET /api/hook-status/{id}
item.description: GET /api/hook-status/{id} Details Component : Core Status : Automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-7792 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/04_hook/01_getAPIHookStatusId.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In BO, Go to Design > Positions Positions Page is displayed correctly. Get the ID of the first hook of the page !https://forge.prestashop.com/plugins/servlet/raven/attachment/1571/ID+hook.png Request with method GET the endpoint “https://[url of your shop]/admin-dev/index.php/api/hook-status/{id}” where {id} is the previous ID get The return value is in JSON. The return data has multiples keys : “id”, “active”
